resources.string: 1. The user is shown 20 tiles. Hidden below these tiles are 10 random images, each repeated twice.
2. The user can touch any two tiles. Touching on a tile will show the image.
3. If the two tiles match, the two tiles disappear and the user gets a point.
4. If the two tiles do not match, both images go back to hidden tiles.
5. Game state is automatically saved when moving between Home screen and Game screen.
